Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT
REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Relates to establishing a presumption of eligibility for housing for those who lost employment due to a non-essential business shutdown
Summary: Establishes a presumption of eligibility for housing for those who lost employment due to a non-essential business shutdown due to the coronavirus.
LawCode: Amd ยง156, Pub Hous L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public housing law, in relation to establishing a presumption of eligibility for housing for those who lost employment due to a non-essential business shutdown
